description: Updates the data storage options for this project. If you store evaluation events, you an keep them and analyze them on your own. If you choose not to store evaluation events, Evidently deletes them after using them to produce metrics and other experiment results that you can view. You can't specify both cloudWatchLogs and s3Destination in the same operation.

parameters.name: cloudWatchLogs
parameters.description: A structure containing the CloudWatch Logs log group where you want to store evaluation events. logGroup (string) --- The name of the log group where the project stores evaluation events.

nested_params.name: logGroup
nested_params.description: The name of the log group where the project stores evaluation events.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the project that you want to modify the data storage options for.

parameters.name: s3Destination
parameters.description: A structure containing the S3 bucket name and bucket prefix where you want to store evaluation events. bucket (string) --- The name of the bucket in which Evidently stores evaluation events. prefix (string) --- The bucket prefix in which Evidently stores evaluation events.

nested_params.name: bucket
nested_params.description: The name of the bucket in which Evidently stores evaluation events.

nested_params.name: prefix
nested_params.description: The bucket prefix in which Evidently stores evaluation events.

nested_items.name: activeExperimentCount
nested_items.description: The number of ongoing experiments currently in the project.

nested_items.name: activeLaunchCount
nested_items.description: The number of ongoing launches currently in the project.

nested_items.name: appConfigResource
nested_items.description: This structure defines the configuration of how your application integrates with AppConfig to run client-side evaluation.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AppConfig application to use for client-side evaluation.

nested_items.name: configurationProfileId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AppConfig profile to use for client-side evaluation.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AppConfig environment to use for client-side evaluation. This must be an environment that is within the application that you specify for applicationId.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The name or ARN of the project.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the project is created.

nested_items.name: dataDelivery
nested_items.description: A structure that contains information about where Evidently is to store evaluation events for longer term storage.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLogs
nested_items.description: If the project stores evaluation events in CloudWatch Logs, this structure stores the log group name.

nested_items.name: logGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the log group where the project stores evaluation events.

nested_items.name: s3Destination
nested_items.description: If the project stores evaluation events in an Amazon S3 bucket, this structure stores the bucket name and bucket prefix.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the bucket in which Evidently stores evaluation events.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The bucket prefix in which Evidently stores evaluation events.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The user-entered description of the project.

nested_items.name: experimentCount
nested_items.description: The number of experiments currently in the project. This includes all experiments that have been created and not deleted, whether they are ongoing or not.

nested_items.name: featureCount
nested_items.description: The number of features currently in the project.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the project was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: launchCount
nested_items.description: The number of launches currently in the project. This includes all launches that have been created and not deleted, whether they are ongoing or not.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the project.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of the project.
(string) ---
(string) ---
